author: senh
title: JetBlue Starts Charging for All Checked Baggage
text: BING NEWS: JetBlue Starts Charging Up to $25 Fee for First Checked Bag Another one bites the dust. JetBlue, which had long touted its one free checked bag perk, started charging for the first checked piece of luggage Tuesday, the airline said in a statement. Customers who booked flights before Tuesday will still be able to ... 06/30/2015 - 10:25 pm | View Link Judge denies UPMC stay; PPG completes Germany expansion; JetBlue starts baggage charges The 190-employee facility expects to add positions to handle the additional work. JetBlue Airways adds fee for checked luggage The era of free checked suitcases on JetBlue has come to an end. The airline proudly proclaimed itself a holdout on fees for ... 06/30/2015 - 7:13 pm | View Link JetBlue adds bag-check fees The era of free checked ... JetBlue has been slowly adopting the practices of other airlines. It has launched and then expanded a first-class product called Mint. It has reduced legroom on some planes to fit more passengers. Now it is charging for bags ... 06/30/2015 - 6:19 pm | View Link JetBlue starts charging baggage fees Jet Blue will begin charging passengers to check their bags on Wednesday, the airline announced. Those who booked their tickets before today won’t have to pay the new fee for the first checked bag. Those paying higher fares or who have reached JetBlue ... 06/30/2015 - 7:38 am | View Link Summer bummer: JetBlue starts charging for checked luggage WASHINGTON — It was nice while it lasted. On Tuesday, JetBlue succumbed to financial pressure and imposed fees for checked luggage. That leaves Southwest Airlines as the sole remaining U.S. carrier to let passengers check their bags for free. Once taken ...
